<li id="cite_note-BitCoin_Tax_issues_Oct_2012-250"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-BitCoin_Tax_issues_Oct_2012_250-0">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"/><cite id="CITEREFStewart,_David_D.Soong_Johnston,_Stephanie_D.2012" class="citation journal cs1 cs1-prop-long-vol">Stewart, David D.; Soong Johnston, Stephanie D. (29 October 2012). "2012 TNT 209-4 NEWS ANALYSIS: VIRTUAL CURRENCY: A NEW WORRY FOR TAX ADMINISTRATORS?. (Release Date: OCTOBER 17, 2012) (Doc 2012-21516)". <i>Tax Notes Today</i>. 2012 TNT 209-4 (2012 TNT 209–4).</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Tax+Notes+Today&amp;rft.atitle=2012+TNT+209-4+NEWS+ANALYSIS%3A+VIRTUAL+CURRENCY%3A+A+NEW+WORRY+FOR+TAX+ADMINISTRATORS%3F.+%28Release+Date%3A+OCTOBER+17%2C+2012%29+%28Doc+2012-21516%29&amp;rft.volume=2012+TNT+209-4&amp;rft.issue=2012+TNT+209%E2%80%934&amp;rft.date=2012-10-29&amp;rft.au=Stewart%2C+David+D.&amp;rft.au=Soong+Johnston%2C+Stephanie+D.&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AHistory+of+bitcoin" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-FAZ20130816-251"><span class="mw-cite-backlink">^ <a href="#cite_ref-FAZ20130816_251-0"><sup><i><b>a</b></i></sup></a> <a href="#cite_ref-FAZ20130816_251-1"><sup><i><b>b</b></i></sup></a></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"/><cite id="CITEREFNestler2013" class="citation news cs1">Nestler, Franz (16 August 2013). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.faz.net/aktuell/finanzen/devisen-rohstoffe/digitale-waehrung-deutschland-erkennt-bitcoins-als-privates-geld-an-12535059.html">"Deutschland erkennt Bitcoins als privates Geld an (Germany recognizes Bitcoin as private money)"</a>. <i><a href="/wiki/Frankfurter_Allgemeine_Zeitung" title="Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung">Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung</a></i>. <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20131022100540/https://www.faz.net/aktuell/finanzen/devisen-rohstoffe/digitale-waehrung-deutschland-erkennt-bitcoins-als-privates-geld-an-12535059.html">Archived</a> from the original on 22 October 2013<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">24 November</span> 2013</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Frankfurter+Allgemeine+Zeitung&amp;rft.atitle=Deutschland+erkennt+Bitcoins+als+privates+Geld+an+%28Germany+recognizes+Bitcoin+as+private+money%29&amp;rft.date=2013-08-16&amp;rft.aulast=Nestler&amp;rft.aufirst=Franz&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.faz.net%2Faktuell%2Ffinanzen%2Fdevisen-rohstoffe%2Fdigitale-waehrung-deutschland-erkennt-bitcoins-als-privates-geld-an-12535059.html&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AHistory+of+bitcoin" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-252"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-252">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">2013-12-05, <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.pbc.gov.cn/publish/goutongjiaoliu/524/2013/20131205153156832222251/20131205153156832222251_.html">中国人民银行等五部委发布《关于防范比特币风险的通知》</a>, <a href="/wiki/People%27s_Bank_of_China" title="People&#39;s Bank of China">People's Bank of China</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20140122192430/http://www.pbc.gov.cn/publish/goutongjiaoliu/524/2013/20131205153156832222251/20131205153156832222251_.html">Archived</a> 22 January 2014 at the <a href="/wiki/Wayback_Machine" title="Wayback Machine">Wayback Machine</a></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-253"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-253">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text">2013-12-06, <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.smh.com.au/business/markets/currencies/china-bans-banks-from-bitcoin-transactions-20131206-2yugy.html">China bans banks from bitcoin transactions</a>, <a href="/wiki/The_Sydney_Morning_Herald" title="The Sydney Morning Herald">The Sydney Morning Herald</a> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20140323102824/http://www.smh.com.au/business/markets/currencies/china-bans-banks-from-bitcoin-transactions-20131206-2yugy.html">Archived</a> 23 March 2014 at the <a href="/wiki/Wayback_Machine" title="Wayback Machine">Wayback Machine</a></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-254"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-254">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"/><cite id="CITEREFRoman_MatzuttJens_HillerMartin_HenzeJan_Henrik_Ziegeldorf2018" class="citation web cs1">Roman Matzutt; Jens Hiller; Martin Henze; Jan Henrik Ziegeldorf; Dirk Mullmann; Oliver Hohlfeld; Klaus Wehrle (2018). <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://fc18.ifca.ai/preproceedings/6.pdf">"A Quantitative Analysis of the Impact of Arbitrary Blockchain Content on Bitcoin"</a> <span class="cs1-format">(PDF)</span>. Financial Cryptography and Data Security 2018. pp.&#160;6–8.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=A+Quantitative+Analysis+of+the+Impact+of+Arbitrary+Blockchain+Content+on+Bitcoin&amp;rft.pages=6-8&amp;rft.pub=Financial+Cryptography+and+Data+Security+2018&amp;rft.date=2018&amp;rft.au=Roman+Matzutt&amp;rft.au=Jens+Hiller&amp;rft.au=Martin+Henze&amp;rft.au=Jan+Henrik+Ziegeldorf&amp;rft.au=Dirk+Mullmann&amp;rft.au=Oliver+Hohlfeld&amp;rft.au=Klaus+Wehrle&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Ffc18.ifca.ai%2Fpreproceedings%2F6.pdf&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AHistory+of+bitcoin" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-255"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-255">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style" href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974"/><cite class="citation web cs1"><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="https://www.interpol.int/en/News-and-Events/News/2015/INTERPOL-cyber-research-identifies-malware-threat-to-virtual-currencies">"INTERPOL cyber research identifies malware threat to virtual currencies"</a>. Interpol<span class="reference-accessdate">. Retrieved <span class="nowrap">25 March</span> 2020</span>.</cite><span title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Abook&amp;rft.genre=unknown&amp;rft.btitle=INTERPOL+cyber+research+identifies+malware+threat+to+virtual+currencies&amp;rft.pub=Interpol&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.interpol.int%2Fen%2FNews-and-Events%2FNews%2F2015%2FINTERPOL-cyber-research-identifies-malware-threat-to-virtual-currencies&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3AHistory+of+bitcoin" class="Z3988"></span></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="External_links">External links</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=History_of_bitcoin&amp;action=edit&amp;section=28" title="Edit section: External links">edit</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<ul><li><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://historyofbitcoin.org/">Interactive bitcoin history</a></li></ul>
